			The great advantage of the AMOS carrier is the proven and at the same time completely simple 3-point quick-release mechanism. Then you simply fasten the rims with the straps and you can set off. The nut is robust, easy to grip in the palm of your hand and is also equipped with a lock to secure the bike against theft. You will be able to move away from your car with the knowledge that your bike is completely safe in the AMOS bike carrier.

				Well-fitting wide nut
				Lockable system
				Designed for roof mounting

Kolumbia Huila régiójában termesztik, ahol 21 olyan gazdaság van, amely nők tulajdonában van, és kizárólag nőket foglalkoztat.
